title: [MINDSET] Ep. 246 How to Tap Into Your Intuition and Live Vibrantly with Jen Riday
itunes:title: [MINDSET] Ep. 246 How to Tap Into Your Intuition and Live Vibrantly with Jen Riday
description:
This week, Ash talks with Jen Riday all about how to follow your intuition and set clear boundaries. 

 

Jen is not only a successful entrepreneur and podcast host, she is a mother to 6 children. And has mastered how to set boundaries not only within her work life but also between her work and family life. If you are struggling with how to say no or where to limit your availability, Jen and Ash walk through how to set clear boundaries for yourself.

 

If you are feeling stuck and aren't sure how to clear with what you want, this episode is filled with actionable tools you can apply daily to lift the fog on your life and bring you into a state of calm and clarity. Be sure to tune!

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. How to set boundaries with others, and with yourself.
  2. Actionable tips to hone in on following your intuition.
  3. How to view challenging times from a new perspective. 
  4. Ways to create emotional safety and regulate your emotions.

 

Resources:

Chatter by Ethan Kross

 

Jen Riday:

https://www.jenriday.com/

Vibrant Woman Podcast

SOUL CBD

 

Here is something just for you to sleep more deeply, reduce stress and heal anxiety.

Visit ashleystahl.com/soul and use the code YOUTURN at checkout for 15% off your order!

Carrus.io

Do you want to get hired into a top tech company or are you looking for interview prep help?

 

Head on over to Carrus.io and book your first session with a tech hiring manager for free!

 

BIOPTIMIZER

 

Sick and tired of being sick or tired? 

 

If you want to improve your sleep quality, try Magnesium Breakthrough, the only magnesium supplement I know of that contains 7 different forms of magnesium. 

 

Visit www.magbreakthrough.com/youturn with code YOUTURN10 for a 10% discount on your order.
